contentrichtext.text: '''Xing'an County''' ({{zh|s=兴安县|t=興安縣}}) is a county in the [[Guangxi]] Zhuang Autonomous Region, under the administration of [[Guilin]] City. Its area is {{convert|2348|sqkm|0}}, with a population {{When|date=February 2011}} of 370000. The postal code is 541300. ==External links== *[http://www.gx.xinhuanet.com/dtzx/xingan/ Xing'an Government webpage] at [[Xinhuanet]] {{coord|25|37|N|110|40|E|display=title}} {{Guangxi}} [[Category:County-level divisions of Guangxi]] [[Category:Guilin]] {{Guangxi-geo-stub}}
